message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to get the best price possible.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $132.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to get a good price.
